00038 ResponseTooBigErr::ResponseTooBigErr() : Error()
00039 {
00040     _error_code=unknown_error;
00041 }
00042 
00043 ResponseTooBigErr::ResponseTooBigErr(const string &msg) : Error()
00044 {
00045     _error_code=unknown_error;
00046     _error_message="";
00047     _error_message+="A caching error was encounterd:\n";
00048     _error_message+=msg+"\n";
00049 }
